skill.name: plan-directory
skill.description: Create or update a structured plan directory with a master PLAN.md index and numbered task files (001-*.md). Each task file includes goal, dependencies, scope, checklist, tests, and completion criteria. Use when scaffolding a repeatable project plan in markdown, especially when the user wants a master index plus per-task files with checkboxes that are checked off as work completes.

skill.author: DiversioTeam

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation and planning templates. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system operations beyond standard LLM tool usage. Safe for publishing.

content.value_statement: Managing complex projects without a structured plan leads to missed tasks and unclear progress. This skill scaffolds comprehensive project plans with numbered task files, checklists, and completion criteria that both humans and AI agents can execute.
actual_capabilities: Creates master PLAN.md index with project overview and task list
Generates numbered task files (001-*.md) with goal, scope, and dependencies
Adds actionable checklists with checkboxes to track progress
Includes test commands and verification steps for each task
Updates existing plans with new tasks or progress markers
limitations: Does not execute tests or commands automatically
Does not integrate with external project management tools
Does not send notifications or reminders
Does not generate timelines or Gantt charts

use_cases.title: Scaffold feature implementation plans
use_cases.description: Break down complex features into numbered tasks with test commands and completion criteria

use_cases.title: Create multi-step project roadmaps
use_cases.description: Define projects with clear deliverables, dependencies, and verification steps

use_cases.title: Generate executable AI-friendly plans
use_cases.description: Create plans that AI assistants can read, update, and complete with clear progress tracking

prompt_templates.title: New feature plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a plan directory for [FEATURE NAME] with these tasks: [TASK 1], [TASK 2], [TASK 3]. Use [DIRECTORY] as the target location.

prompt_templates.title: Add task to plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a new task to [PLAN NAME] plan for [NEW TASK]. The task should include goal, scope, checklist with 5 items, and completion criteria.

prompt_templates.title: Mark task complete
prompt_templates.prompt: I've completed task [NUMBER] in the [PLAN NAME] plan. Update the task file and PLAN.md to mark it as complete.

prompt_templates.title: Complex project breakdown
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive plan directory for [PROJECT NAME] at [DIRECTORY]. Include: purpose statement, locked decisions, [N] numbered tasks with dependencies, explicit test commands for each task, and parallel execution hints where applicable.

output_examples.input: Create a plan for adding user authentication with JWT tokens
output: Created docs/plans/user-auth/PLAN.md - master index with task overview
Created 001-user-model.md - User model and database migrations
Created 002-jwt-setup.md - JWT configuration and token handling

best_practices: Define clear completion criteria before creating tasks
Keep task checklists focused with 3-8 actionable items each
Include runnable test commands in every task file
anti_patterns: Putting detailed steps in PLAN.md instead of task files
Creating tasks with vague checklist items like 'work on feature'
Renumbering tasks after work has started

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code, OpenAI Codex, and any LLM that supports Read, Write, Edit, and Glob tools.

faq.question: How many tasks can a plan contain?
faq.answer: Plans support up to 999 tasks using 3-digit numbering. For larger projects, create sub-plans in nested directories.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with GitHub Projects or Jira?
faq.answer: The skill creates markdown files that can be version-controlled. Manual syncing with external tools is required.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: All data stays local. The skill only creates and edits markdown files in your project directory.

faq.question: Why are my tasks not updating in PLAN.md?
faq.answer: Check that you are using the correct task number format (001, not 1) and that the task file exists in the same directory.

faq.question: How is this different from a todo list app?
faq.answer: This skill creates executable plans with test commands, dependencies, and completion criteria designed for AI-assisted execution.
